speaker.description: Computer scientist, project management consultant, business strategist
speaker.whotheyare: Billy Samuel Mwape is a computer scientist, project management expert and business strategist with more than 16 years of experience in the banking and mining sectors.
speaker.whylisten: Billy Samuel Mwape is a community leader using acquired skills and experience to build practical models to help ameliorate the lives of children living with neurological disorders. He holds an MBA from Heriot-Watt University, a BA in computer science from Copperbelt University and a diploma in telecommunication systems from City and Guilds of London Institute.
